segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried watching him balance on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over any second, and that would be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and know what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she would be shocked if she turned around now and saw the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a slow-motion accident about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should do something, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR
